item.title: Venice: David Rooney’s Top 10 Must-See Titles
item.description: As the world’s oldest film festival gears up for its 82nd edition, THR’s chief film critic surveys the Lido lineup, with new movies from Luca Guadagnino, Guillermo del Toro, Benny Safdie, Park Chan-Wo

item.title: Venice: David Rooney’s Top 10 Must-See Titles
item.description: As the world’s oldest film festival gears up for its 82nd edition, THR’s chief film critic surveys the Lido lineup, with new movies from Luca Guadagnino, Guillermo del Toro, Benny Safdie, Park Chan-Wo

item.title: Jacob Elordi, Oscar Isaac, Mia Goth Feature in New Images From Guillermo Del Toro’s ‘Frankenstein’
item.description: The movie, produced by del Toro and also starring Charles Dance and Christoph Waltz, is set to premiere at this year’s Venice Film Festival, followed by a global release on Netflix in November.

item.title: Jacob Elordi, Oscar Isaac, Mia Goth Feature in New Images From Guillermo Del Toro’s ‘Frankenstein’
item.description: The movie, produced by del Toro and also starring Charles Dance and Christoph Waltz, is set to premiere at this year’s Venice Film Festival, followed by a global release on Netflix in November.

item.title: Stormtrooper Helmet From ‘Star Wars: A New Hope’ Sells for $256K at Auction
item.description: Other props from the franchise, including lightsabers wielded by Ewan McGregor (Obi-Wan Kenobi), Liam Neeson (Qui-Gon Jinn) and Ray Park (Darth Maul), also were sold.

item.title: Stormtrooper Helmet From ‘Star Wars: A New Hope’ Sells for $256K at Auction
item.description: Other props from the franchise, including lightsabers wielded by Ewan McGregor (Obi-Wan Kenobi), Liam Neeson (Qui-Gon Jinn) and Ray Park (Darth Maul), also were sold.
